categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Matare was a male Human Jedi Padawan serving the Jedi Order and the Galactic Republic during the Cold War with the resurgent Sith Empire.

A Force-sensitive Human, Matare was trained in the ways of the Force by the Jedi Order. Following the Great Galactic War and the resurgence of the Sith Empire, Matare returned to the ancestral Jedi homeworld Tython with the rest of the Order and helped rebuild during the Cold War. The Padawan of Jedi Master Kaldona, Matare was uneasy near the ruins of the ancient fortress city of Kaleth as he sensed the dark side of the Force permeating the crumbling stones.
There are two Matares in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic both on the planet Tython—a Zabrak Jedi Master at the Masters' Retreat, and a human Padawan near the ruins of Kaleth.
